segments.text: A : Look at this survey conducted by a website . A quarter of the employees will spend an average of 10 minutes everyday online doing personal things . Hi , Francis , what about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I just spend 15 minutes as so checking my stock bonds and booking an air ticket for my mother . Anyway , I have done all my work and it is about the time to leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Though our company doesn ’ t have a return policy , limiting the personal use of internet , I don ’ t think the boss will like us to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it is lucky for us . The company computers don ’ t have software keeping tracks of websites we visit . I have shopped too often online these days .
segments.speaker: S1
